ComicInfo.Summary:
The mild-mannered, middle school-attending, son of the Grim Reaper thought he was just goofing around with an old box at the museum of supernatural history. Unfortunately, he's released an ancient evil with disturbing designs on the family of Death.
* * The Evil Moloch is set free!! and quickly makes friends with Death Jr. disguising himself as an old family friend. As Moloch begins to get close to DJ he starts clouding his mind with thoughts of power and not having to listen to no one! As it continues Moloch then tricks DJ into giving him his dad's (Death) all powerful Scyth!! Moloch then reveals his real devilish looking form! and DJ starts realizing what a mistake he has made trusting this so called family friend! Now with Death's powerful scyth in Moloch's hand what will happen!
ComicInfo.Title: Death Jr.
